name: Sina - extreme cleaner
description:
This is the extreme clearner version, especially for sina news.
Mainly removes the right column and the bottom area.

And, this style is based on the following styles, many thanks go to their authors:
http://userstyles.org/styles/1222
http://userstyles.org/styles/1677
http://userstyles.org/styles/2771
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("sina.com.cn") {

  div[id^=PublicRelation],

  iframe,

  img[src^="http://ad"],

  div[id="toolBar"],

  td[width="563"],

  a[href^="http://sina.allyes.com"],

  a[href^="http://sina.allyes.com"]~*,

  table[width="750"][height="105"],

  td[width="129"][valign="top"],


table [width="360"] ,table [width="137"],table [width="136"] ,table[width="564"],table[width="565"][BGCOLOR="#FDF9E1"],td[width="129"][bgcolor="#f0efef"],

#toolbar,


HTML > BODY > CENTER > SCRIPT:first-child + DIV + DIV + SCRIPT + TABLE + TABLE + TABLE + TABLE,

IFRAME, 

div[id^=flashcontent], 

span[id^=google_adsense],

div[id^=ad_],

div[id^=ads_],

span[id^=ad_],

span[id^=ads_],

div[id^=PublicRelation],

a[href*="allyes.com"],

a[href*="/nike/"],

#ycyjad,

.topAD,


/* the bottem search bar */
.blkContentBtmSearch,

/* the bottem other functions */
.blkOtherFunction,

/* the bottem comment area */
div[class="Mblk_11 blkCommentBox"],

/* the left bottem stuff */
div[id="GoogleAd"], div[class^="Ad"],
.MTitle_01, .Mblk_01
{
    display:none!important;
}


}
